message: To prepare for the iQIES Survey & Certification Nursing Home launch on July 14, the iQIES system will be unavailable on Friday, July 11, beginning at 8:00 pm ET for Survey & Certification (S&C) operations. The system will remain available to providers for patient assessment submissions. iQIES for S&C operations is expected to be available no later than Monday, July 14, at 8:00 am ET.
